output.sentences: One weekend, the guy is having a great time camping.
He is not alone for he is having a lot of fun with his friends.
Later, he and his friend drive back to the campground.
At the site, the party quickly set up the food and tents at the camp.
With the tents up, they will be sound to sleep comfortably at night.
